attributes.action: Stop all business with Saudi Arabia.
attributes.background: Missing Saudi journalist Jamal Khashoggi was tortured and killed inside the Saudi consulate in Istanbul.

rejection.details:
Petitions have to call on the UK Government and Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you would like the Government to take action against Saudi Arabia, but we are not sure what action you would like it to take. In particular, we are not sure whether you mean stop all government to government business, or impose sanctions restricting private business.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
